0:
dn: ${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
dc: tinfoilforest
o: Tinfoilforest
objectclass: top
objectclass: dcObject
objectclass: organization

dn: ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: people

dn: ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: groups

dn: cn=ben,ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ben
gidNumber: 8742
objectclass: top
objectclass: posixGroup

dn: uid=ben,ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ben
givenName: Ben
sn: ben
uid: ben
uidNumber: 8742
gidNumber: 8742
homeDirectory: /home/ben
loginShell: /bin/bash
mail: "${SECRET_ADMIN_EMAIL}"
objectClass: top
objectClass: inetOrgPerson
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
userPassword: {SSHA}x

dn: cn=ness,ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ness
gidNumber: 8743
objectclass: top
objectclass: posixGroup

dn: uid=ness,ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ness
givenName: ness
sn: ness
uid: ness
uidNumber: 8743
gidNumber: 8743
homeDirectory: /home/ness
loginShell: /bin/bash
mail: ${SECRET_PARTNER_EMAIL}
objectClass: top
objectClass: inetOrgPerson
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
userPassword: {SSHA}x

--illegal-access=warn -Djava.security.manager=allow -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 --add-opens java.base/jdk.internal.loader=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.net=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.nio=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.io=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.lang.reflect=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.text=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/jdk.internal.reflect=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/sun.nio.ch=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens jdk.naming.dns/com.sun.jndi.dns=ALL-UNNAMED,java.naming --add-opens java.desktop/sun.awt.image=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.desktop/com.sun.imageio.plugins.png=ALL-UNNAMED --add-modules jdk.dynalink --add-opens jdk.dynalink/jdk.dynalink.beans=ALL-UNNAMED --add-modules java.sql.rowset --add-opens java.sql.rowset/javax.sql.rowset.serial=ALL-UNNAMED -jar lwjgl3ify-forgePatches.jar

version: v1
flags:
  migStrategy: none
sharing:
  timeSlicing:
    renameByDefault: false
    failRequestsGreaterThanOne: false
    resources:
      - name: nvidia.com/gpu
        replicas: 2

- job_name: node-exporter
  honor_labels: true
  scrape_interval: 1m
  scrape_timeout: 10s
  metrics_path: /metrics
  scheme: http
  static_configs:
    - targets:
        - "10.5.0.10:9100"
